concept.title: Cold Weather Operations
concept.shortdesc: Cold weather operations bring visions of long arctic nights, glaciers, Eskimos, and stories you have heard of the Far North.

fig.title: Cold weather operations
fig.desc: Image of some men in flying garb near an airplane with obvious snow on the ground.

conbody.p: But it is well to bear in mind that during the winter months many sections of the United States have climatic conditions requiring just as much specialized maintenance as the Arctic.
Granted that the conditions are not as severe, it is still important that you know how to care for your plane.
